title: The Future of JavaScript Frameworks
description: A deep dive into the latest trends and predictions for JavaScript frameworks. We'll explore the pros and cons of the most popular frameworks and what to expect in the coming year.

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
description: Learn how to design and build robust and scalable APIs using Node.js and Express. We'll cover best practices for authentication, rate limiting, and error handling.

title: CSS Grid and Flexbox: A Modern Approach to Layout
description: Master the power of CSS Grid and Flexbox to create complex and responsive layouts with ease. This talk will include live coding examples and practical tips.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
description: A beginner-friendly introduction to the world of machine learning. We'll cover the basic concepts and algorithms, and build a simple predictive model using Python.

title: The Rise of Serverless Computing
description: Discover the benefits of serverless computing and how it can help you build and deploy applications faster and more efficiently. We'll explore the major serverless platforms and their use cases.

title: Cybersecurity in 2026: Threats and Countermeasures
description: An overview of the latest cybersecurity threats and how to protect your applications and infrastructure. We'll discuss common vulnerabilities and best practices for securing your systems.
